detectors.description: ERC20Token.randomly() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x02b5841550f699e68b32336d3f88fcf689ebfa20-ERC20Token.sol#443-447) uses a weak PRNG: screen (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x02b5841550f699e68b32336d3f88fcf689ebfa20-ERC20Token.sol#446)

ERC20Token.randomly() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x02b5841550f699e68b32336d3f88fcf689ebfa20-ERC20Token.sol#443-447) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: screen = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(now,msg.sender,nicetacos))) % 100 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x02b5841550f699e68b32336d3f88fcf689ebfa20-ERC20Token.sol#444)
